tool_description: Monitors real-time queue status across all agents and departments providing comprehensive queue metrics and alerts.

monitoring_scope.description: Scope of monitoring: all_agents, department, or specific_agents

department_filter.description: Array of department names to monitor

agent_filter.description: Array of specific agent IDs to monitor

include_historical.description: Whether to include historical trend data

error_messages: Invalid monitoring scope: Must be one of [all_agents, department, specific_agents].
Department not found: One or more specified departments do not exist.
Agent not found: One or more specified agent IDs are invalid.
Monitoring system unavailable: Queue monitoring system temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide monitoring_scope and optionally department_filter, agent_filter, and include_historical to monitor queue status.

total_calls_queued.description: Total number of calls currently in all queues

average_wait_time.description: Average wait time across all monitored queues in minutes

longest_wait_time.description: Longest current wait time in minutes

agents_busy.description: Number of agents currently handling calls

performance_indicators.description: Key performance indicators for current queue status
